description: Try our easy to follow Healthier Thai Green Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Green curry,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Spring,Video,Low sugar,Sesame free,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Wheat free,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Healthier Thai Green Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half the oil in a large frying pan over high heat. Cook chicken, in 2 batches, for 2 minutes or until lightly golden. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.

Heat remaining oil in same pan. Add paste and cook, stirring frequently, for 2 minutes or until fragrant. Add milk and 1 cup water, then bring to simmer. Reduce heat to low, then add vegetable mix and simmer for 5 minutes or until almost cooked through. Return chicken to pan and cook for a further 3 minutes or until chicken is heated through. Stir in half the basil leaves and lime juice.
Meanwhile, place noodles in a large heatproof bowl. Cover with boiling water and stand for 5 minutes or until softened. Drain well.
Serve curry on noodles, topped with snow peas, remaining basil leaves and lime.
